Package io.atomix.primitive

Interface DistributedPrimitive

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncAtomicCounter, AsyncAtomicCounterMap<K>, AsyncAtomicDocumentTree<V>, AsyncAtomicIdGenerator, AsyncAtomicLock, AsyncAtomicMap<K,​V>, AsyncAtomicMultimap<K,​V>, AsyncAtomicNavigableMap<K,​V>, AsyncAtomicSemaphore, AsyncAtomicSortedMap<K,​V>, AsyncAtomicValue<V>, AsyncDistributedCollection<E>, AsyncDistributedCounter, AsyncDistributedCyclicBarrier, AsyncDistributedList<E>, AsyncDistributedLock, AsyncDistributedMap<K,​V>, AsyncDistributedMultimap<K,​V>, AsyncDistributedMultiset<E>, AsyncDistributedNavigableMap<K,​V>, AsyncDistributedNavigableSet<E>, AsyncDistributedQueue<E>, AsyncDistributedSemaphore, AsyncDistributedSet<E>, AsyncDistributedSortedMap<K,​V>, AsyncDistributedSortedSet<E>, AsyncDistributedValue<V>, AsyncLeaderElection<T>, AsyncLeaderElector<T>, AsyncPrimitive, AsyncTransaction, AsyncTransactionalMap<K,​V>, AsyncTransactionalSet<E>, AsyncWorkQueue<E>, AtomicCounter, AtomicCounterMap<K>, AtomicDocumentTree<V>, AtomicIdGenerator, AtomicLock, AtomicMap<K,​V>, AtomicMultimap<K,​V>, AtomicNavigableMap<K,​V>, AtomicSemaphore, AtomicSortedMap<K,​V>, AtomicValue<V>, DistributedCollection<E>, DistributedCounter, DistributedCyclicBarrier, DistributedList<E>, DistributedLock, DistributedMap<K,​V>, DistributedMultimap<K,​V>, DistributedMultiset<E>, DistributedNavigableMap<K,​V>, DistributedNavigableSet<E>, DistributedQueue<E>, DistributedSet<E>, DistributedSortedMap<K,​V>, DistributedSortedSet<E>, DistributedValue<V>, LeaderElection<T>, LeaderElector<T>, SyncPrimitive, Transaction, TransactionalMap<K,​V>, TransactionalSet<E>, TransactionParticipant<T>, WorkQueue<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAsyncPrimitive, DistributedSemaphore, Synchronous
    public interface DistributedPrimitive
    Interface for all distributed primitives.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static long DEFAULT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
      Default timeout for primitive operations.
